resources.string: It\'s your voice, it\'s your choice, it\'s your future and it\'s YOUR right... Be heard!

We can help if you are: 
-Not being listened to 
-In need of some advice 
-In need of help to talk to Social Services 
-Aren't being treated fairly 
-Being told you have to move 
-Having difficulties about school 
-Not having the contact with your family that you want 
-Homeless 
-A vulnerable adult who is disabled 
-A carer 
-Experiencing the separation or divorce of your parents 
-Not feeling safe

NYAS is an established national charity that ensures that children and young people are given a voice in any issue that affects them.\n
We have many volunteer posts available across the UK.\n
"Volunteering has always been the most rewarding of my activities and NYAS showed me a new way of exploring that world. The training was perfect to get started in the programme and get to know the area and your role better, and it was very nicely organised. The support given by the coordinators is fantastic giving a very warm approach to the programme. It is indeed a great experience for you as a person and for the young person, and I strongly recommend it to anyone. It develops your skills, broadens your mind and allows you to meet very interesting people. I'm sure you would not be let down."
You can either send us an email with your name and concerns or just give us a call.\nPlease note that calling us from a mobile might charge you.
We offer information, advice, advocacy and legal representation to children, young people and vulnerable adults.
Choose your personal pin from these symbols. Just pick 4 and remember the order!
CAREFUL: Deleting your Profile or Appointments is PERMANENT! You could always re-enter them of course.
Welcome to your personal space.\nOnly your personal pin lets you get here! Remember it well.
Welcome back! How can we help?
